column3: 1976]Party in the Back
column5: 1976]Chrysalis on themselves. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2180{}{}{}Grand Pas{}{}{}Your creatures' attacks and spells ignore 20% of {ACTION_defending} and {ACTION_provoking} enemies' {STAT_defense}. This effect is increased by 100% if the target is both {ACTION_defending} and {ACTION_provoking}. This trait does not stack.

2181{}{}{}Hoodwink{}{}{}Enemies always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_TAUNT}. Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} have a 50% chance to target {ACTION_provoking} allies with attacks and spells. This trait does not stack.

2182{}{}{}Innocence{}{}{}Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} take 10% more damage from this debuff for each time an enemy has taken {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} damage in the current battle. This trait does not stack.
2183{}{}{}Entrancing{}{}{}Enemies always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_DEFENSIVE}. After an enemy {ACTION_defends}
column2: this creature afflicts them with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP}. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2184{}{}{}Heartstrings{}{}{}At the end of each enemy's turn
column2: they {ACTION_cast} one of their spells. After an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} {ACTION_casts} a spell
column3: they take damage equal 20% of this creature's {STAT_intelligence}. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2185{}{}{}Spotlight{}{}{}At the end of each enemy's turn
column2: they {ACTION_attack} this creature for 15% normal damage and are afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED}. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2186{}{}{}Circus Reverie{}{}{}Your creatures deal additional damage with attacks and spells equal to 10% of their {STAT_attack} for each buff their target has. This trait does not stack.
2187{}{}{}Glissando{}{}{}Enemies always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_AGILE}. The first time an enemy dodges each turn
column2: each of your creatures {ACTION_attack} that enemy for 50% normal damage. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2188{}{}{}Adoration{}{}{}At the end of each enemy's turn
column2: they {ACTION_cast} a healing Spell Gem equipped by this creature in your favor. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2189{}{}{}Thunder God's Wrath{}{}{}This creature's [icons
column2: 1976]Lightning Strike deals additional damage equal to 75% of its {STAT_intelligence}. At the end of each {ACTION_provoking} enemy's turn
column3: this creature {ACTION_casts} [icons
column4: 1976]Lightning Strike on all {ACTION_provoking} enemies. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2190{}{}{}Master of Calumniers{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Calumnier}s
column2: they do not have decreased stats from their Personalities.

column1: 2191{}{}{}Master of Cataclysms{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Cataclysm}s
column2: their traits have a 10% chance to activate at the start of each creatures' turn as well. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2192{}{}{}Master of Effigies{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Effigy} creatures
column2: they always have {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED}
column3: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}
column5: and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} and take 75% less damage from these debuffs.

column1: 2193{}{}{}Master of Eggxotics{}{}{}Your {RACE_Eggxotic} creatures share the permanent buffs referenced in their traits with each other.
2194{}{}{}Master of Lucanians{}{}{}After all start-of-battle effects occur
column2: if all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Lucanian}s
column3: their {STAT_attack} and {STAT_intelligence} are set equal to whichever is highest.

column1: 2195{}{}{}Master of Marionettes{}{}{}After your {RACE_Marionette} creatures perform an action
column2: the enemy in their corresponding position performs the same action and is afflicted with a random debuff. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2196{}{}{}Master of Robodomis{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Robodomi}s
column2: they grant their allies {CONDNAME_BUFF_REBIRTH} after they are killed.

column1: 2197{}{}{}Master of Spacecats{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Spacecat}s
column2: they deal 5% more damage with attacks and spells for each permanent Spell Gem each of your creatures have that do not belong to their class. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2198{}{}{}Master of Spelljugglers{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Spelljuggler}s
column2: their single-target spells now target all the target's allies if the spell belongs to a different class than the last one they cast.

column1: 2199{}{}{}Master of Elementasaurs{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Elementasaur}s
column2: they are resistant to debuffs and are afflicted with the debuffs referenced in their traits at the start of battle. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2200{}{}{}Master of Mirelings{}{}{}Enemies have 5% less stats (other than {STAT_health} for each unique class among your creatures. If all 5 classes are present
column2: your {RACE_Mireling} traits act as if there is 1 additional class. This trait does not stack.

column1: 2201{}{}{}Master of Underdwellers{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Underdweller}s
column2: they cannot lose stats and their stat changes persist after death.

column1: 2202{}{}{}Master of Denizens{}{}{}If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Denizen}s
column2: enemies take 50% more damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}. This trait does not stack.
